EmailTemplate.subject: Civil Mandates Could Affect Military Missions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Do you know that by 2020 all aircraft must transmit Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) information when flying in European and US air-space? Military aircraft that do not have ADS-B out will be required to request access to fly. Don't get caught out on critical missions with red tape and forms. Honeywell can help to update your fleet in time if you take action now.Â
BOOK A MEETING <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/_Defense_ADSB.html]]>
